TEXT: The Caster, blob of the dark. It's cute isn't it?
You feel yourself filled steep within the elemental chaos...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several spooky fellas in the midst of some occult role-playing. As you approach, they turn to you in creepy unison. The palest cosplayer with his fanged teeth extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Formless~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~. Yucky.
